cases = int(raw_input())
a = []
while ((cases ) >0 ):
    cases = cases -1
    people = int(raw_input())
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while (2**i <= people):
        i+=1
        #print(i)
    j = j +1
    k = int(2**(i-1))
    a.insert(j-1,k)

a.reverse()

i=0
j = len(a)
while (j >0):
    
    j = j -1
    print(a[i])
    i =i+1
